catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 240
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: woman in richly decorated red kimono loosely embracing a large white crane with her PL arm; vertical rock with blossoms at R; horizontal blossoming branch extending just above her head
markings: LRC red artist\'s seal: 常正 {Tsunemasa}
medium: Ink, color, and gold on paper
provenance: Azabu Museum fo Art; then sold at Christie's New York, Park Avenue, Sale 9044 (AN IMPORTANT COLLECTION OF JAPANESE UKIYO-E PAINTINGS), 27 October 1998, lot 42, $2,990 to Mary Burke
signed: LRC: 常正画 {Tsunemasa ga} (painted by Tsunemasa)
title: Parody of a Beautiful Woman as Rin Nasei (Ch. Lin Hejing) with Crane
